name: Podcatchup
tagline: Podcast manager designed for streaming and marking episodes as read
body:
### Welcome to PodCatchup HomePage.
![PodCatchup main screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/degoedel/PodCatchup/master/PodCatchup.PNG)
This software is intended to Manage and stream podcast episodes on a desktop.
What you can do with it :Â 
Add or remove a podcast through its feed.
Stream an episode.
Mark it as read or new.
If you pause it, or quit the app, you will be able to resume the stream where you left it.
And that's all.

**You can download the installer for the current version** [here](https://github.com/degoedel/PodCatchup/raw/master/PodCatchupSetup/PodCatchup%20V1.0.0.msi) .
### Requirements
.Net 4.5 is required. So you should be fine on Windows 7 and over as long as you're up to date.
Since the application only does streaming, you need an internet connection obviously.

### Dependencies
Outside of [Prism](https://compositewpf.codeplex.com/), this project also uses: 
* [LiteDB](https://github.com/mbdavid/LiteDB) by @mbdavid for data persistence
* [CSCore](https://github.com/filoe/cscore) by @filoe for audio streaming
* [Mahapps](https://github.com/MahApps/MahApps.Metro) by @MahApps for theming


### License
This project is under [MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
In short do what you want with it, it's put here as is.

### Authors and Contributors
Well for now there's only me....
so : Damien Galban (@degoedel).
